title: Daimajuu Gekitou: Hagane no Oni
title_japanese: 大魔獣激闘　鋼の鬼
title_synonyms: Demon of Steel: Battle of the Great Demon Beasts
synopsis: In the year 1999, a team of UN scientists in an attempt to tap into a new energy resource on a deserted island called Sansara, unknownigly open a portal to another universe, unleashing dormant biomechanical entities. Three years later, Takuya Goroza returns to the island of Sansara urged by a mysterious request by college chum Haruka Alford. Little does he know, his old friend isn't what he appears to be... (Source: ANN)
